title: Scuttle Crab Journal Entry
body:
https://36.media.tumblr.com/b108ee22890fb7f2902da9bb13830bee/tumblr_njj0hfxo3U1smb6iho2_1280.jpg

The Red Brambleback was well received, so  thought I would continue. Here is the requested Scuttle Crab :)

replies.body: !!! Love this!
Any chance of making it canon?
I approve
Your name, omg, haha.

Now i feel bad about providing vision to my team :(
Why cant they bury themselves before theyre mortally wounded giving off a light that tricks opponents i to believing theyre dead? T.T

I would like to see a gromp to :)

> [{quoted}](name=epicz753,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=3JEEpgvM,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-02-10T06:07:45.399+0000)
>

Gromp is up actually! He is right [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/6GInAv8w-gromp-journal-entry) .

Cool effort, but I have a note- even when he reaches 0 hp, he doesn't actually "die"- if you look closely, you can see that when the crab ward wears off, he digs himself out and goes back to patrolling the river

> [{quoted}](name=Tal9922,realm=EUNE,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=3JEEpgvM,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-09T22:00:16.008+0000)
>
> Cool effort, but I have a note- even when he reaches 0 hp, he doesn't actually "die"- if you look closely, you can see that when the crab ward wears off, he digs himself out and goes back to patrolling the river

Fair point, but this doesn't 100% rely on the Scuttle Crabs in game behavior, more so it as a creature. I actually haven't seen a scuttle respawn though, though you see it moving back underground to its location when it dies. I'll take your word for it, and update Scuttle Crab's entry to support this, and remove the burden of guilt on the Scuttle Crab attackers.
Poor scuttle :C

"When near death, the Scuttle Crab will flee in a series of erratic movements in attempt to confuse the attacker."

True, so true. Krugs next!

Make them seem like a pack of dinosaurs that no one wants to screw with.
